name: Wafa Ammous
title: Interior Designer
bio: With over 10 years of experience in the interior design industry, I specialize in creating beautiful and functional spaces that reflect my clients' unique styles and needs. My passion for design began at a young age, and I have since honed my skills through education and hands-on experience in various design projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Interior Design

experience.description: Lead designer on residential and commercial projects, overseeing all aspects from concept to completion.
Assisted in design development and client presentations, contributing to various successful projects.
